data.eml:eml: A new species of Leptogaster Meigen (Diptera, Asilidae) from Turkey with egg and spermatheca structure

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hasbenli, Abdullah, Candan, Selami, Alpay, Neslihan (2006): A new species of Leptogaster Meigen (Diptera, Asilidae) from Turkey with egg and spermatheca structure. Zootaxa 1267: 49-57, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173189
